full_summary:
## Procurement Notice for Web Multi-Media Content Consultant, Senior
### Reference Number : #23-236882

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) hereby invites interested Supply Arrangement Holders to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Web Multi-Media Content Consultant, Senior.

#### Issuing Office:

* Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
* 125 Sussex Dr
* Ottawa, Ontario
* K1A 0G2 Canada

#### Solicitation Date: 

February 28, 2023
#### Closing Date:

March 20, 2023, 02:00 PM (EST)

#### Contract Type:

The contract is for a Task-Based Information Professional Services (TBIPS) requirement.

#### Competition Status:

Competitive

#### Requirement:

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking an independent firm with a broad base of experience and subject matter expertise in user research and user-centered design.

* One (1) Web Multi-Media Content Consultant (senior) will be required to develop and undertake the redesign of the TCS website
* The contractor will shape the modernization of the TCS digital online presence and service delivery for one (1) year with an additional two (2), one (1) year option periods
* Minimum corporate security required: Secret
* Minimum resource security required: Secret

#### Eligibility:

The tendering procedure is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578 – 170432/B, who have been qualified under Tier 1 for the following categories:

* Category of resource: Stream 1: A16.1 Web Multi-Media Content Consultant, Senior
 

#### Documents:

 Documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders. Bidders are advised that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

#### Place of business:

The place of business for the contractor shall be in Ottawa, Ontario as designated by the contracting authority. The address shall be clearly marked as the "place of business" and shall be used exclusively for the provision of services related to this contract.

For further information, please contact the Contracting Authority: Kingsley Knight, 343-203-8234, Kingsley.Knight@international.gc.ca. Please include the Reference Number #23-236882 in your email.

Word count: 391.
